T02TD1598E:116b-0: @116b * // rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i bsad pa las kyi man ngag bzhugs//
T02TD1598E:116b-2: # // rnal 'byor gang zhig rdo rje phag mo sgrub pa la dmigs te /
T02TD1598E:116b-3: nyi ma'i gung la khros pa'i nga rgyal gyis //
T02TD1598E:116b-4: mngon spyod kyi rdzas dur khrod kyi sol bas /
T02TD1598E:116b-5: 'dab ma drug pa g-yon skor gyis bris la /
T02TD1598E:116b-6: aom che ge mo m'a ra ya bam zhes rtsibs bzhi la bri /
T02TD1598E:116b-7: rnal 'byor ma drug dang dbus su he ru ka'i rnam pa'am /
T02TD1598E:116b-8: yi ge bsgrub bya'i ming dang spel te bri bar bya ba ni /
T02TD1598E:116b-10: mchod sbyin gyi shing lo la mi rus kyi smyu gus bri'o //
T02TD1598E:116b-11: dur khrod kyi thal bas gzugs brnyan byas pa'i snying gar bcug la /
T02TD1598E:116b-13: rang gi khyim du drag po'i thab khung ji lta ba bzhin du bcas /
T02TD1598E:116b-14: de ru gzugs de lcags kyi skam pas bzung nas thal bar ma song bar du bsreg / ro bsregs pa'i sar brkos te nang du gzhug / dur khrod me la yang dang yang du bsro zhing /
T02TD1598E:116b-15: mi rus kyi phur pas snying gar gdab /
T02TD1598E:116b-16: tsher mas mtshams med par gang bar bya /
T02TD1598E:116b-17: snying gar chu tshan blugs na nges par 'chi'o //
T02TD1598E:116b-18: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i bsad pa las kyi man ngag /
T02TD1598E:116b-19: slob dpon aa bhi dzu ka tas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
